verbs.description: [ARG0: The presidents of North and South Korea] [V: held] [ARG1: a secret meeting] [ARGM-PRP: to try to get the summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un back on track] .
[ARG0: The presidents of North and South Korea] held a secret meeting to [V: try] [ARG1: to get the summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un back on track] .
The presidents of North and South Korea held a secret meeting to try to [V: get] [ARG1: the summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARG2: back on track] .
